query.statement:
SELECT A.CHAR1 AS CHAR1 ,A.CHDAT AS CHDAT ,A.DDATE AS DDATE ,A.DNAME AS DNAME ,A.DTIME AS DTIME ,A.EBELN AS EBELN ,A.EBELP AS EBELP ,A.EDATE AS EDATE ,A.EINDT AS EINDT ,A.EKGRP AS EKGRP ,A.ETIME AS ETIME ,A.EXTWG AS EXTWG ,A.GROES AS GROES ,A.INFNR AS INFNR ,A.KNTTP AS KNTTP ,A.LGOBE AS LGOBE ,A.LGORT AS LGORT ,A.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,A.LIFNR AS LNAME ,A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,A.BISMT AS BISMT ,A.MEINS AS MEINS ,A.MENGE AS MENGE ,A.MENGE1 AS MENGE1 ,A.B_MENGE AS B_MENGE ,A.NAME1 AS NAME1 ,A.NETPR AS NETPR ,A.POSID AS POSID ,A.POST1 AS POST1 ,A.POTYPE AS POTYPE ,A.PSTYP AS PSTYP ,A.SDATE AS SDATE ,A.SNAME AS SNAME ,A.STATE AS STATE ,A.STIME AS STIME ,A.SUBMI AS SUBMI ,A.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 ,A.UDATE AS UDATE ,A.VALUE AS VALUE ,A.WAERS AS WAERS ,A.WERKS AS WERKS ,A.ZEINR AS ZEINR ,A.CHECK AS CHECK ,A.RV_NAME AS RV_NAME ,A.R_EKGRP AS R_EKGRP ,A.TEX01 AS TEX01 ,A.BIGO AS BIGO ,A.SILCHEUK AS SILCHEUK ,A.P_END AS P_END ,A.S_VEND AS S_VEND ,A.BOXCK AS BOXCK , CASE WHEN A.EXTWG IS NULL OR A.EXTWG = '' OR (A.BOX_CK = '' AND A.EXTWG = 'BOX33') OR (A.BOX_CK = '24' AND A.EXTWG='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN A.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN A.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN A.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN A.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN A.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN A.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN A.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= A.MANDT AND BOXNO = A.EXTWG) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= A.MANDT AND BOXNO = A.EXTWG) END ) WHEN '1' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN '2' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN '3' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN '4' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN '5' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) END AS SHIPDAT -- 서면발주 시 정보레코드 입력기한 발주서 출력 위해 조회 2016.05.19 JYW , CASE WHEN VALUE(MM143.EBELN,'') = '' THEN '' ELSE 'X' END AS INFO_DATE , (SELECT txt30 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT= A.MANDT AND POSID = substr(A.POSID,1,6)) as txt30 , A.BUDAT FROM ( SELECT MM013.CHAR1 AS CHAR1 , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.CHDAT) AS CHDAT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.CHTIM) AS CHTIM , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.DDATE) AS DDATE , MM013.DNAME AS DNAME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.DTIME) AS DTIME , MM013.EBELN AS EBELN , MM013.EBELP AS EBELP , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EDATE) AS EDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EINDT) AS EINDT , MM013.EKGRP AS EKGRP , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.ETIME) AS ETIME , MM013.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM013.GROES AS GROES , MM013.INFNR AS INFNR , MM013.KNTTP AS KNTTP , MM013.LGOBE AS LGOBE , MM013.LGORT AS LGORT , MM013.LIFNR AS LIFNR , MM013.LNAME AS LNAME , MM013.MANDT AS MANDT , MM013.MATNR AS MATNR , VALUE(MM011.BISMT,'') AS BISMT , MM013.MEINS AS MEINS , MM013.MENGE AS MENGE , (MM013.MENGE - VALUE(MM017A.MENGE, 0)) AS MENGE1 , VALUE(MM017A.B_MENGE, 0) AS B_MENGE , MM013.NAME1 AS NAME1 , SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(MM013.WAERS,MM013.NETPR) AS NETPR , MM013.POSID AS POSID , MM013.POST1 AS POST1 , MM013.POTYPE AS POTYPE , MM013.PSTYP AS PSTYP , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.SDATE) AS SDATE , MM013.SNAME AS SNAME , MM013.STATE AS STATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.STIME) AS STIME , MM013.SUBMI AS SUBMI , (MM011.MATNR_NM ||','|| MM011.ZSIZE ||','|| MM011.SPEC) AS TXZ01 , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.UDATE) AS UDATE , MM013.VALUE AS VALUE , MM013.WAERS AS WAERS , MM013.WERKS AS WERKS , MM013.ZEINR AS ZEINR , '0' AS CHECK , SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(MM013.MANDT, MM013.LIFNR) AS RV_NAME , (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = '10' AND CODE2 = MM013.EKGRP) AS R_EKGRP , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,7,2) = 'NS' OR SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,7,2) = 'NB' OR SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN SAPHEE.GET_REMARK(MM013.MANDT, SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,11),MM013.MATNR,' | ',270) ELSE SAPHEE.GET_REMARK(MM013.MANDT, SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,9),MM013.MATNR,' | ',270) END AS TEX01 , CASE WHEN MM013.WERKS <> '2000' AND SAPHEE.GET_JAJEA_BALJU(MM013.MANDT, MM013.POSID,MM013.MATNR) < 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS BIGO -- ,'0' AS BIGO , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013.MATNR,1,3) = '361' THEN SAPHEE.GET_SILCHEUK(MM013.MANDT,MM013.POSID) ELSE '' END AS SILCHEUK , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_PROJ_END(MM013.MANDT,MM013.POSID ),'') AS P_END , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_SEOLCHI_VEND_NAME(MM013.MANDT,MM013.POSID ),'') AS S_VEND , CASE WHEN MM013.BOX_CK = '24' THEN '신박스' ELSE '구박스' END AS BOXCK , MM013.BOX_CK AS BOX_CK , MM011.BLOCK_NO AS BLOCK_NO , MM017A.BUDAT AS BUDAT
FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT , EBELN , EBELP ,COALESCE(SUM(MM017.MENGE - MM017.B_MENGE),0) AS MENGE ,COALESCE(SUM(MM017.B_MENGE),0) AS B_MENGE , BUDAT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 AS MM017 WHERE MM017.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM017.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND MM017.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM017.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM017.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM017.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM017.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM017.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM017.MATNR LIKE #MATNR# || '%'
AND MM017.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM017.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
-- AND MM017.POTYPE = '' AND MM017.PRO_F >= '1' GROUP BY MM017.MANDT,MM017.EBELN,MM017.EBELP,MM017.BUDAT) AS MM017A ON MM013.MANDT = MM017A.MANDT AND MM013.EBELN = MM017A.EBELN AND MM013.EBELP = MM017A.EBELP WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND MM013.STATE = '2'
AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM013.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM013.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM013.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM013.MATNR LIKE #MATNR# || '%'
AND MM013.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM013.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
-- AND MM013.POTYPE = '' ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON A.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT143 AS MM143 ON A.MANDT = MM143.MANDT AND A.EBELN = MM143.EBELN AND A.EBELP = MM143.EBELP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS ZM1 ON A.MANDT = ZM1.MANDT AND ZM1.POSID = SUBSTR(A.POSID,1,6)
ORDER BY A.EBELN, A.EBELP, A.UDATE, A.POSID FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
